item.description:
This hypnosis session is designed to decrease - even eliminate - your test anxiety!
No matter what kind of test you're preparing for, we'd like to help. There will be two
consulting hypnotists who also have 5 decades of experience teaching people of
all ages.
The session will start with a brief informal discussion about methods and techniques which help in preparing for an exam, a brief explanation of what the hypnosis session will be like, and then the actual hypnosis session. During the hypnosis, you will be reminded of your goal for easy recall, confidence, and ultimate success! Those thoughts can stay with you for your next tests, whether the test are for school, for work, or for your sports and hobbies and you can do very well, smoothly and easily!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Test Anxiety Group Hypnosis $10 4-5:30pm
